languages.text: "По поводу тех людей с нижних палуб... мне кажется, блюстители палку перегнули. Нельзя держать людей в черном теле все время — если не забузят, то как минимум чердаком поедут".
"About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."
languages.original_text: "По поводу тех людей с нижних палуб... мне кажется, блюстители палку перегнули. Нельзя держать людей в черном теле все время — если не забузят, то как минимум чердаком поедут".

traits.locale_text: "About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."

traits.locale_text: "About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."

traits.locale_text: "About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “关于那些下层甲板的人……我认为执法者做得太过火了。你不能让人们一直趴在地上，就算他们不起哄滋事，迟早也会发疯的。”
languages.original_text: "About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."

traits.locale_text: “关于那些下层甲板的人……我认为镇压者做得太过火了。你不能让人们一直趴在地上，就算他们不起哄滋事，迟早也会发疯的。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je crois que les prévôts y sont allés un peu fort avec ceux des ponts inférieurs... On ne peut pas écraser les gens encore et encore et s'attendre à ce qu'ils se laissent faire indéfiniment. S'ils ne finissent pas par se rebeller, cela ne peut que les pousser à la folie. »
languages.original_text: "About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."

traits.locale_text: « Je crois que les prévôts y sont allés un peu fort avec ceux des ponts inférieurs... On ne peut pas écraser les gens encore et encore et s'attendre à ce qu'ils se laissent faire indéfiniment. S'ils ne finissent pas par se rebeller, cela ne peut que les pousser à la folie. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Was die Leute von den Unterdecks angeht ... Ich finde, die Enforcers sind zu weit gegangen. Man kann die Leute nicht immer nur kleinhalten. Selbst, wenn sie nicht rebellieren, verlieren sie definitiv den Verstand."
languages.original_text: "About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."

traits.locale_text: "Was die Leute von den Unterdecks angeht ... Ich finde, die Enforcers sind zu weit gegangen. Man kann die Leute nicht immer nur kleinhalten. Selbst, wenn sie nicht rebellieren, verlieren sie definitiv den Verstand."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「下層デッキの人たちだけど…執行官たちは無理しすぎてる。働きづめにさせておくわけにはいかないでしょう。不満を表に出さないとしても、気が変になるに違いないわ」
languages.original_text: "About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."

traits.locale_text: 「下層デッキの人たちだけど…執行官たちは無理しすぎてる。働きづめにさせておくわけにはいかないでしょう。不満を表に出さないとしても、気が変になるに違いないわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Sobre la gente de las cubiertas inferiores... creo que el personal de seguridad se extralimitó. No es posible mantener siempre oprimida a la gente. Aunque no protesten, acabarán por enloquecer».
languages.original_text: "About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."

traits.locale_text: «Sobre la gente de las cubiertas inferiores... creo que el personal de seguridad se extralimitó. No es posible mantener siempre oprimida a la gente. Aunque no protesten, acabarán por enloquecer».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Alt güvertedekilerin hâli içler acısı. İnfazcılar bu sefer haddini aştı. İnsanları sürekli baskı altında tutamazsın. Tamam belki kızılca kıyamet koparamazlar ama gün gelir balatayı sıyırıverirler."
languages.original_text: "About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."

traits.locale_text: "Alt güvertedekilerin hâline bak... İnfazcılar bu sefer haddini aşmış. İnsanları böyle sürekli yer altında tutamazlar. Belki millet itiraz edemiyor ama akıl sağlıklarını yitirmemeleri imkânsız."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "About those folk from the lower decks... I think the enforcers went overboard. You can't keep people ground down all the time — even if they don't kick up a fuss, they'll definitely go crazy."
